sentence.Network_en: So we sailed down to the sun till we found the sea green.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此我们向着太阳驶去,直到发现一片绿色的海.

sentence.Network_en: Blue is the sea, Green is the grass, White is the clouds , As they slowly pass.
sentence.Network_cn: 蓝蓝的海, 青青的草.雪白的云儿, 慢慢地飘.

sentence.Network_en: The shallow sea bed yields up an abundance of food.
sentence.Network_cn: 浅海床提供了丰富的食物。

entry.def: Something that is sea-green is a bluish-green colour like the colour of the sea.
